data.text: You are the best father-in-law in the world because you never let the words in-law get in-between our relationship
Dad in law, many things have changed over the years, but you are still the same awesome person you always have been
My future looks brighter because you are in it! Happy Birthday to a great guy – my Dad in Law
The warmest wishes to one of the most special people in my life – my Dad in Law
Happy Birthday to my Father in Law! Take time to relax and enjoy your day.
Wishing the happiest of birthdays to the sweetest of fathers-in-law in the universe
Today I pray that happiness will enter your house and never depart. Happy birthday father-in-law
Thank you for going all out to put a smile on my face. As great fathers-in-law go, you are certainly outstanding. Happy birthday.
Wishing a truly glorious birthday to my father-in-law Trust in God with all your heart and He will make the impossibilities possible
May this special day bless you with the strength to overcome the obstacles that life puts in your way. Happy birthday
I pray that you dwell in prosperity and happiness all the days of your life. Happy birthday father-in-law
Thank you so much for loving me like your own. Happy Birthday. dearest father-in-law
I feel so blessed to have a father-in-law like you in my life thats why I want to make it up to you this time
May this year be filled with so much joy and happiness for you. Wishing you a very Happy Bday dear Daddy-in-law
Wonderful Birthday my dearest Father-in-Law! Wishing you good health, joy, and more birthdays to come.
Since today is your special day, your wish is my command. This is just once a year opportunity so wish for the best
Happy Birthday to you dearest Father-in-law, I hope your day is as unique as you are
If every father-in-law were like you, there would be no sadness in the world
Happy birthday to a father-in-law who should be an example for others
I feel so blessed to have a father-in-law like you in my life thats why I wanna make it up to you this time
Best Bday to the coolest, extraordinary and amazing Daddy-in-law in the world
Happy Birthday to the greatest father-in-law in the whole wide world
Wonderful Birthday Daddy-in law! May you have a wonderful and a heart-warming day ahead
The future looks better than before because you are a great part of it. Best Bday to one of the greatest guys I’ve   ever known My Father-in-law!
Happy Birthday my beloved Father-in-law.Happy Birthday my beloved Father-in-law
